title: Add outputDetail parameter to query_reminders (minimal/compact/full)
description: New param controlling how much detail is returned. compact is default. JMESPath overrides to full.

title: Wire JMESPath override: ignore outputDetail when query is present
description: When JMESPath query param is provided, always use full fields as input regardless of outputDetail setting.

title: Claude iOS Reminders API Parity
description: Epic: Implement all missing features to reach parity with the Claude iOS Reminders API (reminder_*_v0 tools). See docs/plans/2026-02-11_compare-reminders-api.md for the full comparison.

title: Add alarm support (absolute + relative)
description: Add alarm/notification support to reminders. The Claude iOS API supports an array of alarms per reminder, with two types: absolute (specific datetime) and relative (seconds before due date). This needs to be added to create_reminders, update_reminders, and the reminder output model. EventKit supports this via EKAlarm with absoluteDate and relativeOffset.

title: Add recurrence/RRULE support
description: Add recurrence rule support to reminders. The Claude iOS API supports full iCalendar RRULE with structured helper fields: frequency (daily/weekly/monthly/yearly), interval, daysOfWeek, dayOfMonth, months, position, and end conditions (count or until date). Also includes humanReadableFrequency. Needs to be added to create_reminders, update_reminders, and the reminder output model. EventKit supports this via EKRecurrenceRule.

title: Add url field to reminders
description: Add url field to reminder creation, update, and output. EventKit supports this natively via EKReminder.url (inherited from EKCalendarItem). Low effort change.

title: Add dueDateIncludesTime field
description: Add dueDateIncludesTime boolean field to reminder creation, update, and output. Maps to EventKit's isAllDay property on EKCalendarItem. When false, the reminder is all-day. Low effort change.

title: Add searchText parameter to query_reminders
description: Add a searchText parameter to query_reminders as a convenient shortcut for text search across reminder titles and notes. This is simpler than requiring JMESPath contains() expressions for common text search use cases. JMESPath remains available as the power-user option.

title: Add dateFrom/dateTo parameters to query_reminders
description: Add dateFrom and dateTo parameters to query_reminders for convenient date range filtering. Like the Claude iOS API, these should have semantic switching: for incomplete reminders filter by due date, for completed reminders filter by completion date. ISO 8601 format. Medium effort.

title: Implement field filtering and null stripping in encodableArray
description: Refactor encodableArray to support field subsetting and null stripping as final step. Full always includes all keys.
